text: Has anyone used Catboost on julia?

elements.text: Has anyone used Catboost on julia?

text: Did you guys write a wrapper on just used PyCall?

elements.text: Did you guys write a wrapper on just used PyCall?

text: We started with PyCall. I got the feeling that the C interface is not well exposed - but I didn’t investigate it thoroughly.

elements.text: We started with PyCall. I got the feeling that the C interface is not well exposed - but I didn’t investigate it thoroughly.

text: <@U01C3624SGJ> there’s a set of standards we enforce for our packages, and our wrapper PyCall package is not quite there yet. If you need it immediately, you might write something small yourself.
